properties.areaDesc: Clinton, PA; Lycoming, PA; Northumberland, PA; Union, PA
properties.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 8 at 6:48AM EST until January 8 at 7:30AM EST by NWS State College PA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a

* Snow Squall Warning for...
Northwestern Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania...
Lycoming County in north central Pennsylvania...
Northeastern Union County in central Pennsylvania...
East central Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania...

* Until 730 AM EST.

* At 648 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line
extending from near Buttonwood to near Glen Union, moving east at
35 mph.

HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in snow and blowing snow. Wind
gusts up to 30 mph.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect hazardous road conditions.

* This includes Interstate 180 from mile markers 6 to 29.

Locations impacted include...
Williamsport, Montoursville, Jersey Shore, Muncy, Hughesville,
Montgomery, Avis, Duboistown, Allenwood, Elimsport, Waterville,
Ralston, Trout Run, Barbours, Little Pine State Park, Cogan Station,
Collomsville, Delaware Run, English Center and Buttonwood.
properties.instruction:
Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the
visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.

CMAMtext: Snow Squall Warning til 7:30 AM EST. Sudden whiteouts. Icy roads. Slow down! -NWS
